#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
#include<cmath>
int main()
{
int t;
cin>> t;
while(t--)
{

 long long int n;
 scanf("%lld",&n);

 int temp =0;
 long long int val = n;
 while(val)
 {
   temp += val%10;
   val/=10;
   }
long long int result = n*(pow(2,temp));
   cout<<  result<< endl;
   }}
